Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Rosa, tiene 35 años, es divorciada en su unión conyugal ha concebido una hija de 13 años que estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad. 

La Señora. Rosa se dedica a  los quehaceres de su hogar y cuidar de su hija, labora vendiendo leche actividad que la realiza hace 3 años y  de domingo a domingo, también en su casa cría cuyes, pollos, ganado y cerdos.  Se dedica a la agricultura y lo que produce  es solo para consumo de su hogar.
 
Se encuentra en el segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra un becerro para seguir creciendo en la cría de animales.
 
Su meta es terminar su casa ya que aun le hacen falta algunos acabados. 

Las dos niñas de la foto son hijas de dos de las socias.

loans.use: Comprar un becerro.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 6 children. 
Evelyn has a shop that sells generic & over-the-counter medicines in tablets, capsules & syrups. She has had this business for 7 years. She requested a loan for 20,000 to buy stocks of generic & over-the-counter drugs for sell.
Evelyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2008 .  In the future, Evelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of generic & over-the-counter drugs for sell

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is 51 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 2 children. 
Marietta has a shop that sells fish like sardines, trout & mackerel. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 18,000 to buy stocks of fish for sell.
Marietta has been a member of HSPFI since 2009.  In the future, Marietta hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of fish for sell

loans.name: Baatarhuu

texts.en: Baatarhuu is a 34 years old man who lives with his wife and and 3 children in Arhangai province in Central Mongolia. His 2 children study at the secondary school. He has been running wooden products production business since 2005 with his wife. The business has been successful and there are number of regular customers. The clear income is around 400,000 MNT a month. It is the only financial source for the family. Baatarhuu is a hardworking and talented man who says that ""I would like to develop the business activity by buying some necessary materials for the business to earn more"". The total amount he is requesting is 500,000 MNY to buy some materials.

loans.use: To buy some materials

loans.name: Baby Angel

texts.en:
Baby Angel is 19 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Baby Angel has a poultry shop that raise & sells chickens . She has had this business for 1 year. She requested a loan for 15,000 to buy animal feeds for the chicken.
Baby Angel has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Baby Angel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy animal feeds for the chicken

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en: Corazon who is married has 8 children. She is 53 years old, and resides at Tabid, Ozamis City: Philippines. Corazon plants & harvests root crops such as "kangkong" for sale to earn a living and she's been 15 years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 5,000.00 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2011, Corazon joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Corazon wants to make improvements of her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.en:
Virgilio is 52 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 1 child. 
Virgilio is buying & peddling food supplement & vitamins. He has had this business for 15 years. He requested a loan for 17,000 to buy stocks of food supplement & vitamins.
Virgilio has been a member of HSPFI for since 2008.  In the future, Virgilio hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of food supplement & vitamins

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is from Calabayan, Ozamis City. She is 48 years old. Estrella is married and has 5 children. 

To make a living, Estrella is running a general store, selling a variety of food and home used products in the local community. Estrella has been in her business for 8 years and earns 5,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Estrella is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand product offering. In 2007, Estrella joined GDMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand product offering

loans.name: Bhelrey

texts.en:
Bhelrey is 26 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 2 children. 
Bhelrey has a shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. He is also a gold dust buyer & seller. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for 11,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sell.
Bhelrey has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011.  In the future, Bhelrey hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sell

loans.name: Erma

texts.en:
Erma is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 3 children. 
Erma is buying & peddling clothes like pants, underwear & blouses. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 to buy stocks of clothing for sell.
Erma has been a member of HSPFI since 2011 .  In the future,Erma hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of clothing for sell

loans.name: Erdenebayar

texts.en: Erdenebayar is a 49 years old man who lives with his wife and 2 children in Uvurhangai province in Central Mongolia. His wife is unemployed and the children study at the college and high school. He has started consumer goods retails in 1998. Since that times, the business has been successful and found many regular customers. The business has been the only financial source for the family members. Erdenebayar is a good-natured man who is responsible for what he is doing and says that "I would like to expand the business activities by buying the supplies in large quantities so that I could improve the household". The total amount he is requesting is 1,500,000 MNT to buy the goods, such is a cleanser, soup, napkin etc in wholesale.

loans.use: To buy the goods, such is a cleanser, soup, napkin etc

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en:
Rhoda is 34 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Rhoda has a shop that sells snacks like waffles & binangkal. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 11,000 to buy raw ingredients needed for making snacks .
Rhoda has been a member of HSPFI since 2011 .  In the future, Rhoda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for making snacks

loans.name: Jessie

texts.en:
Jessie is 49 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. 
Jessie has a shop that sells snacks like hotcakes, banana cakes & sweet potato cake. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 to buy raw ingredients for making snacks.
Jessie has been a member of HSPFI since 2011 .  In the future, Jessie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is a married with two children. She is 49 years old and lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Elsa owns and operates a plot of farm land, planting bananas to earn a living. She has been in this business for 8 years and earns PHP 3,000 each month. She requested a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase farm chemicals. Elsa has been a member of Kiva's partner, GDMPC, for a year. In the future, Elsa's plan is to save her returns in order to make improvements to their house.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals

loans.name: Ganzorig

texts.en: Ganzorig is a 48 years old man who lives with his wife and 2children in Darhan city in Northern Mongolia. His oldest daughter studies at the secondary school. He has started painting 2008 and sold them. With the profits from the business, he bought a sewing machine for his wife. His wife started sewing sleeping bag, mat, and hats in different styles. They trades them at the well- positioned shop counter of the big trade center. Ganzorig is a talented man who says that "I would like to develop my business activity by buying a new sewing machine for the business to keep it successfully". The total amount he is requesting is 400,000 MNT to buy a new sewing machine for his wife.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine

loans.name: Reika

texts.en:
Reika is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with 1 child. 
Reika has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store that buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan for 9,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Reika has been a member of HSPFI since 2008.  In the future, Reika hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sell

loans.name: Elpedia

texts.en: Elpedia is married who has three children. Elpedia is 51 years old, who lives in Dela Paz, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Elpedia own and operate a farm land, planting & harvesting rice for sale to earn a living and she's been 6 years in this business. Each month, she earns 8,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 10,000.00 to purchase fertilizer to increase production. In 2011, Elpedia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Elpedia hopes to be more successful in her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to increase production

loans.name: Arturo

texts.en:
Arturo is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 4 children. 
Arturo has a shop that whole selling coconuts for copra & corn grains. He has had this business for 15 years. He requested a loan for 10,000 to buy stocks of coconuts for copra & corn grains for sell.
Arturo has been a member of HSPFI for since 2011.  In the future,Arturo  hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of coconuts for copra & corn grains for sell

loans.name: Batjargal

texts.en: Batjargal is a 36 years old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in Uvurhangai province in Central Mongolia. Her 2 sons study at the high school and the husband is employed. She has been running food retails since 2000 in the small town of the province. She trades food products which are for the daily use. She also started retailing loud speakers, its equipment and the computers. She is planning to expand the business to buy the supplies. Batjargal is a diligent woman who says that "I would like to develop the business activities by purchasing the necessary equipment of loud speakers and the computers so that I could raise the income and save for my sons college fees". The total amount she is requesting is 2,000,000 MNT to buy the more grocery product.

loans.use: To buy the more grocery product

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.en:
Eduardo has been engaged to livestock business for three years. He is 38 years old, married having three children.He is thankful because his wife has been helping him to earn for living,through vending native cakes within the community they lives.

By this time,he raised one sow and 15 piglets.He devotes his time in his livestock business because he would like to nourish them well so that whenever they reach their optimum growth, he could sell them into higher price.He aims to raised all his 15 piglets,but raising them all is quite hard due to the feeds that has to be fed to them daily.So,Eduardo is in need of bigger capital allowing him to buy 15 cavans of feeds and vaccines.He is asking a loan of P40,000,he hopes that he could avail this loan amount so that he could maintain the business allowing him to obtain greater income to sustain his family needs.

On the business picture taken, the client is on left side wearing white shirts and the project officer wearing jacket is on the right side.

loans.use: to be use in buying 15 cavans of  feeds supplies and vaccine of raised hogs

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is separated and has 3 children. Norma is 42-years-old and lives in the Philippines.

Norma is a farmer and she manage a coconut production to earn a living. She has been doing this for 2 years and every month she earn 4,000.00 from this work. She has requested a loan of 12,000.00 to pay for the cost of farm maintenance.

Norma has been a member of GDMPC for 4 years. In the future, Norma hopes to finished the study of her children.

loans.use: to pay for the cost of farm maintenance.

loans.name: Bayarmagnai

texts.en: Bayarmagnai is a 50 years old man who lives with her wife and 2 daughters in Selen province in Northern Mongolia. His daughters work at the cafe. He has started planting the vegetables in 2000. Since 2007 he start to sell his vegetables  in the border cities with wife help . He has been running it with his wife and a son who lives independent from the parents. This has been really successful business because the profits are high and the demand in different cities make the business more popular. Bayarmagnai is a hardworking man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying a new truck for the business". The total amount he is requesting is 2,500,000 MNT to buy a new truck.

loans.use: To buy a new truck

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda is married and she is 58 years old who lives in Yahong, Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Erlinda owns and operates a plot of farm land, where she plants bananas, root crops and tomatoes to earn a living. She's been in this business for 9 years and earns PHP 4,000 each month. She requested a loan of PHP 7,100 to purchase farm chemicals. Erlinda been a Kiva's partner, GDMPC, in 2011. In the future, Erlinda's plan is to save her returns in order to support their daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals

loans.name: Ochirsuuri

texts.en: Ochirsuuri is a 42 years old man who lives with his wife and 2 children in Uvurhangai province in Central Mongolia. His children go to the high school. He has been running wood and iron made products retails business since 2001. During the times, the business has been successful and his wife started working at the shop counter, selling the products. He also built a new workplace for the business. Ochirsuuri is a talented man who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the necessary equipment because they have broken and needed to be replaced". The total amount he is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to buy the business necessary equipment.

loans.use: To buy the business necessary equipment

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en: Rosie is married, 34 years of age, and lives in Lapasan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental together with her 4 kids. Rosie is operating a sari-sari store to earn a living. She has been in this business for 9 years and she earns 2,000 PHP every month. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase supplementary goods for her general store. Rosie's business is very stable in her community. She joined GDMPC last 2006. In the future, Rosie will use her income to support her 4 kids in their studies until they finish college and also in their daily needs. Rosie wishes that their business will be more progressive.

loans.use: to purchase supplementary goods for her general store

loans.name: Bayarnemeh

texts.en: Bayarnemeh is a 35 years old woman who lives with her grandmother and her daughter in Arhangai province in Central Mongolia. She has been running milk products retails business for 6 years. During these times, she has made many regular customers not only in the town but also in the neighbour towns. She plans to develop the business activities further. She produces the milk made products in summertime and sells them in four seasons. Bayarnemeh is a good-natured woman who says that ""I would like to expand the business activity by buying the supplies like dairy products in wholesale so that I could raise the income for my family"". The total amount she is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to buy the dairy products.

loans.use: To buy the dairy products

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is from Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is 49 years old. Vivian is married and has 6 children.

To make a living, Vivian owns and operates a motorcycle transport service. Vivian has been engaged in her business for over 10 years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month for these activities.

Vivian is requesting a loan of 5,800 PHP, which will be used to pay for the cost paid in maintenance and repair of motorcycle.

In 2008, Vivian joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation.
She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to pay for the cost paid in maintenance and repair of motorcycle.

loans.name: Belina

texts.en: Belina is a married woman having 4 children. Belina is 45 years old, residing at Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Belina owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living and she's been 18 years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000.00 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 5,000.00 to purchase more stocks such as shampoo, soaps, noodles and etc. In 2009, Belina joined GDMPC. In the future, Belina wants to build house and to finished the study of her children.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks such as shampoo, soaps, noodles and etc.

loans.name: Sherlita

texts.en: Sherlita is married, 52 years of age, and lives in Lapasan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental together with her 7 kids. Sherlita is operating a sari-sari store to earn a living. She has been in this business for 12 years and she earns 5,000 PHP every month. She is requesting a loan of 11,100 PHP to purchase supplementary goods for her general store. She joined GDMPC last 2011. In the future, Rosie will use her income to support her 7 kids in their studies until they finish college and also in their daily needs. Sherlita wishes that their business will be more progressive.

loans.use: to purchase supplementary goods for her general store

loans.name: Nena

texts.en: Nena is a 52-year old widow, a resident of Liposong, Ozamis City. She provides her 4 children needs from the little amount of 5,000 she gains monthly from her own piggery business for 5 years as an aid to the income gained. However in 2007 she's been a member of GDMPC, and she applies a loan at GDMPC micro finance of 10,000 to buy feeding supplies. Nena wants to make expansion to her business one day.

loans.use: to buy feeding supplies

loans.name: Munhtuvshin

texts.en: Munhtuvshin is a 41 years old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in the capital city of Mongolia. Her husband is operates tire repair center. Her children study at the college and high schools. She has been running garment retails business for 9 years. She trades the garment to the people when they are at their work. She has got a small van which she uses for the business to trade them. She is a diligent woman who says that "My husband planning to open new tire repair center. We want to develop our business and so we need new equipment. If we could do it, we would continue our business successfully ". The total amount she is requesting is 1,300,000 MNT to purchase new equipment for his husband business.

loans.use: To purchase new equipment for his husband business.

loans.name: Otgonbayar

texts.en: Otgonbayar is a 42 years old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in the capital city of Mongolia. Her two children study at the high school. She has been running the boots production business since 1993 with her husband. She makes the traditional boots in different and excellent styles and trades them at the well positioned shop counter at 'Narantuul' market, the biggest trade center. She has been experienced on the field and recognizes the demand and the change in the field. Otgonbayar is a diligent woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by making my workplace bigger than now". The total amount she is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to make the workplace bigger.

loans.use: To make the workplace bigger

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en: Yolanda, is married, is 51 years old who lives in Tabid, Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Yolanda owns and operates a plot of farm land, where she plants bananas, root crops to earn a living. She's been in this business for 9 years and earns PHP 4,000 each month. She requested a loan of PHP 8,000 to purchase farm chemicals. Yolanda been a Kiva's partner, GDMPC, in 2007. In the future, Yolanda's plan is to save her returns in order to support their daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase farm chemicals.

loans.name: Selenge

texts.en: Selenge is a 41 years old man who lives with his wife and son in Uvurhangai province in Central Mongolia. His wife works as a teacher at the secondary school. He has been running wooden and iron made products production business since 1995. He used to do construction work previously and expanded the business activities. Now he prepares different kinds of wooden and iron made products to the local people and they appreciate the things he supplies. He employs two workers in summertime and make construction work. Selenge is a professional and talented man on the field and says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the necessary materials like wood and iron in large quantities so that I could continue the business successfully". The total amount he is requesting is 500,000 MNT to buy the necessary materials.

loans.use: To buy the necessary materials

loans.name: Analiza

texts.en: Analiza is 31 years old, married. She lives in Yahong, Tudela, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Analiza own and operate a farm land, planting & harvesting bananas for sale to earn a living and she's been 6 years in this business. Each month, she earns 3,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 5,300.00 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. In 2011, Analiza joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Analiza wants to make improvements of her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Cherlita

texts.en:
Cherlita is 40 years old and married with 3 children.

Cherlita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her sari-sari store.

Cherlita has borrowed and paid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 4 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Cherlita aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase more items to sell

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en: Naomi is 40 years old,married with 6 children. She sells fruits and vegetables to earn a living,she has been in the business for 4 years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya,she has been able to educate her children and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy vegetables and fruits for sell.

loans.use: To vegetables and fruits for sell

loans.name: Felomina

texts.en:
Felomina is 51 years old and has 3 children. Felomina is married and has 2 children who are in school.

Felomina is in the agricultural business farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Felomina requested a PHP 19000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Felomina has been farming sugarcane for 10 years now, and has borrowed 17 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Felomina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy fertilzers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Laura

texts.en:
Laura works hard to support her family. Laura is married and has a dress making business in the Philippines.

Laura requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials for dress making.

Laura has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Laura would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more materials for dress making

loans.name: Luvisminda

texts.en:
As a married parent of 6 children, Luvisminda works hard to support her family.

She has a buying and selling fermented shrimps business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried fish. Luvisminda is borrowing PHP 29500 through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of fermented shrimps for her buying and selling fermented shrimps business.

Luvisminda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 28 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks of fermented shrimps

loans.name: Ma. Cristina

texts.en:
Ma. Cristina is 40 years old and married with 4 children.

She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Ma. Cristina is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Ma. Cristina has been farming sugarcane for 6 years and also earns additional income from raising livestock.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy fertilzers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is 46 years old and married with 4 children. With 3 children in school, Marlyn works very hard to provide for them.

Marlyn runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her sari-sari store.

Marlyn has been in this business for 7 years and sells a variety of items such as egg, spices, noodles, bread, etc.. 

In the future Marlyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann is 34 years old and married with 4 children. With 4 children in school, Mary Ann works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Ann runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell.

Mary Ann has been in this business for 5 years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, snack foods, spices, etc.. 

In the future Mary Ann would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks to sell

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 38 years old and married with 3 children. With 2 children in school, Mary Jane works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Jane runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29500 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell.

Mary Jane has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as milk, coffee, sugar, soap, etc.. 

In the future Mary Jane would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy more stocks to sell

loans.name: Rosela

texts.en:
Rosela is 57 years old and married with 3 children.

Rosela works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her sari-sari store.

Rosela has borrowed and paid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 8 years and also earns an income from food vending and electronic re-loading.

Rosela aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy additioanl items to sell

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 51 years old and married with 4 children.

Rosemarie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell.

Rosemarie has borrowed and paid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 13 years and also earns an income from motorcycle transport.

Rosemarie aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy items to sell

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 19500 through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

Ruth has been in this business for 4 years. Ruth earns more income from farming sugarcane.

Ruth has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To buy spare parts for motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Ruvelyn

texts.en:
Ruvelyn is 37 years old and married with 3 children.

Ruvelyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell.

Ruvelyn has borrowed and paid 7 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 4 years and also earns an income from buying and selling rice and charcoal.

Ruvelyn aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional stocks to sell

loans.name: Genalyn

texts.en:
Genalyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buying and selling of rice grains business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13000 through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell for her buying and selling of rice grains business.

Genalyn has been in this business for 3 years. Genalyn earns more income from farming vegetables.

Genalyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks to sell

loans.name: Ginalyn

texts.en:
Ginalyn is 27 years old and has 4 children. Ginalyn is married and has 2 children who are in school.

Ginalyn is in the agricultural business farming vegetables in the Philippines. Ginalyn requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Ginalyn has been farming vegetables for 8 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Ginalyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy fertilzers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Joanne

texts.en:
Joanne is 32 years old and married with one child.

Joanne works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell.

Joanne has borrowed and paid 10 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from motorcycle transport.

Joanne aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks to sell

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 37 years old and married with 3 children.

Josephine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a charcoal retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29500 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Josephine has borrowed and paid 19 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the charcoal retail business for 20 years and also earns an income from farming rice.

Josephine aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
53 years-old Armen lives in Yerevan. He has two children who are both students. Armen’s daughter is a fourth year student of Armenian “Haybusak” University and she studies at design and clothes modeling department. Armen’s son is a third year student at State Engineering University of Armenia and he studies at cybernetics department. 
Armen is asking for a 250.000 AMD loan to pay for his children’s tuition fees for second semester.  
Armen works at auto assembly organization as a metalworker and his wife works at confectionary as a candy-maker.

loans.use: to pay for his children’s tuition fees for second semester

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is 41 years old,married with 2 children. He does motorcycle transport business to earn a living,he has been in the business for 2 years and has employed two people. He describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to grow his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike

loans.name: Rachel

texts.en:
Rachel works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Rachel requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

She has been in this business for 5 years.

In the future, Rachel would like to save enough money to expand her food stall at public market.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Tazagul

texts.en:
Tazagul is married but doesn’t have any children. She has been involved in her cattle-breeding business for 20 years. She sells the milk products at the village and calves to the butchers. She owns the area where she plants potatoes and keeps chickens in her yard.
Tazagul wants to obtain 1,000 Azerbaijan New Manats (AZN) to buy two calves. The income from the business that she is planning to expand will be very useful for her family.

loans.use: To pay for the calves.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 36 years old,married with 3 children. He runs a hardware store and sells gas cylinders to earn a living. He has been in the business for 6 years  and has employed two people. To earn extra income he does farming. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy gas cylinders for sell.

loans.use: To buy gas cylinders for sell

loans.name: Dorjbayar

texts.en: Mr. Dorjbayar, 29 is a railway man and has been doing his job for 3 years hardly. His monthly income does not usually meet with his family necessities. He lives with his wife and his son in the common which is in Kherlen, a boundary town of Mongolia. His living apartment is built by the early of 1960’s and it has had renovations just few times since it built. Now it needed an urgent renovation and repair to its some of parts. Especially he plans to change its cloaca and to renovate some other bad parts. As he said, he very wants to live his family in comfortable and good living condition in the further. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchase the building and decoration materials for his home repair.

loans.use: To purchase the building and decoration materials for his home repair.

loans.name: Dembereldorj

texts.en:
Mr. Dembereldorj, 46 runs a small computer game center in a rental house. Actually he is a driver and goes for passenger transportation in intercity. But he wanted start his second business such as a computer game center. He has been running his new business for a half year. At first he started it with just 3 personal computers and now he owns 6 computers. Otherwise he tries to expand his business day by day. Having more computers give him an opportunity to increase his business earnings. His wife sometimes works instead of him in his game center when he runs his transportation business. 
Now Dembereldorj is requesting a loan to purchase the more computers for his computer game center for expanding his business.

loans.use: To purchase the more computers for his computer game center for expanding his business.

loans.name: Chet

texts.en:
Chet, 25, lives with her spouse and 3 children in her own home in Batey district in Kompong Cham province. She is a local farmer who grows rice on the existing farmland. She has been in the business for 8 years. Her spouse works in the same business to share his responsibility for the family, and also acts as a village health worker.

Chet is requesting a loan of 300.00USD for her husband to purchase medical devices and stock of medicine for medical business. This loan will be useful for her family and other villagers who need medical treatment from her husband.

loans.use: to purchase medical devices and stock of medicine for medical business.

loans.name: Sân

texts.en:
Sân is 35 years old and a mother of 3 school-age children. Her daily income mainly depends on crops cultivation. She works on her own farmland which she inherited from her parents. She has been in this business for almost 7 years. Her business is located in Prey Chor district of Kompong Cham province.

To attain her business goal, she would like to take out a loan to hire people to till the land and buy farming inputs such as rice seeds and fertilizers. So she can start doing her business since the early of rainy season this year w+hen the rain is coming. She is very happy to receive a loan to get her business improved gradually. Her plan is to expand her business, renovate her house and send her children to university after they finish high school.

loans.use: to hire people to till the land and buy farming inputs such as rice seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is 35 years old,married with 3 children. She runs a retail shop to earn a living,she has been in the business for 13 years and has employed one person. She describes her business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. To earn extra income she does farming. Since she joined Faulu Kenya,she has been able to save her income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar,rice,cooking oil,tea leaves and cereals for sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar,rice,cooking oil,tea leaves and cereals for sell

loans.name: Naila

texts.en:
Naila is 40 years old. She lives in Gardabani District, East Georgia with her family: husband – Mubariz and two children (19 and 21 years old). Naila earns on living through agricultural business. The family runs a dairy farm with 8 milk cows and 13 calves. Naila sells milk to local dairy product producer companies. Also the family sells calves in the village. Total average monthly income of the family is 1000 Laris. 

Naila requested credit for purchasing feed for cows and calves. She will purchase hay and use it for feeding livestock until May. In May Naila will sell calves and get income. She plans to reinvest it in further development of the dairy farm. In particular, Naila wants to purchase additional milk cows.

loans.use: to purchase feed for cows and calves

loans.name: Syphrose

texts.en: Syphrose is 49 years old,married with 6 children. She sells curtains to earn a living,she has been in the business for 11 years and has employed one person. She describes her business environment as busy because many people visit her daily. Since she joined Faulu Kenya,she has been able to educate her children and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy curtains for sell.

loans.use: To buy curtains for sell.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is 60 years old,married with 2 children. She runs a grocery store to earn a living,she has been in the business for 4 years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. To earn extra income she does farming. Since she joined Faulu Kenya,she has been able to educate her children and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy potatoes,bananas and tomatoes for sell

loans.use: To buy potatoes,bananas and tomatoes for sell

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Daniel is 33 years old,married with 2 children. He does motor vehicle transport business to earn a living,he has been in the business for 3 years and has employed two people. To earn extra income he does farming. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to grow his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy spare parts for his car.

loans.use: To buy  spare parts for his car.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 37 years old,married with 3 children. He runs a retail shop to earn a living,he has been in the business for 11 years and has employed two people. He describes his business environment as good because he has many customers who visit him regularly. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 70,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar,maize flour,cooking oil and sodas for sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar,maize flour,cooking oil and sodas for sell

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 43 years old,married with 4 children. He runs a photography shop to earn a living,he has been in the business for 15 years and has employed 2 people. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to improve his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to 2 digital cameras.

loans.use: To buy 2 digital cameras

loans.name: Misha

texts.en:
Misha is 55 years old. He lives in Meghry town, in the south of Armenia with his wife, Elmira, and son, Artur. Misha works as a driver. Two years ago he got involved in agricultural business and started to breed cattle. Now ArtMisha r wants to increase the number of cattle and develop his farm. With the help of this loan he plans to purchase 4 cows and forage to feed the cattle. 
Misha dreams of having a big farm, where he will keep other types of cattle, too. Current expansion of the farm allows him to gather more income and make his dream come true.

loans.use: to pay for cows

loans.name: Nicholus

texts.en: Nicholus is 28 years old,married with one child. He sells used shoes to earn a living,he has been in the business for 4 years and describes his business environment as conducive because there is limited competition.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to improve his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 35,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more shoes for sell.

loans.use: To buy  more shoes for sell

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit is 39 years old. He lives in Artabuynk village with his family: mother, wife and three children. Davit is an accountant at the local village hall. Besides, he has been running a grocery. Being very hard working and initiative man, Davit also started running a farm, where he currently breeds 2 cows. 
As there are all favorable conditions to develop the farm, Davit would like to increase the number of cattle develop sheep breeding, too. With the help of this loan Davit plans to purchase a cow and 8 sheep. This will allow Davit to make his farm more profitable. 
Increase of income means better opportunities for Davit to insure economically stable future for his family.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and 8 sheep

location.town: Artabuynk village of  Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is 30 years old,married with one child. He sells motor vehicle spare parts to earn a living,he has been in the business for 8 years and has employed one person. He describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to improve  his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy motor vehicle spare parts for sell.

loans.use: To buy motor vehicle spare parts for sell

loans.name: Bathuu

texts.en: Bathuu is a 34 years old man who lives with his wife and a son in Huvsgul province in Northern Mongolia. His son studies at the secondary school. He has started creating wooden products in 2006. Since that time, he has been making wooden products at his home. His wife trades the products at the trade center. The business has been wide on the area and has been expanded significantly. He bought a truck and a small van for the business and family needs. Bathuu is a hardworking man who says that "I would like to expand the business by buying some materials for the business so that I could create more and sell them in wholesale". The total amount he is requesting is 3,500,000 MNT to buy necessary materials.

loans.use: To buy necessary materials

loans.name: Chamroen

texts.en:
Chamroen is 49 years old. She makes a living in farming business. Rice is the main part of the family’s income. She describes herself as a low-educated woman and a humble farmer. However, Chamroen is very diligent about her daily work to insure a sustainable living for her 4 single children.

This loan is to rent a plot of farmland, pay for plowing fee, buy seeds and fertilizers, including pesticides to for her rice crops. Her dream is to own a wide farmland and produce a satisfied output from the rice field.

loans.use: to rent a plot of farmland, pay for plowing fee, buy seeds and fertilizers, including pesticides to for her rice crops.

loans.name: Piruz

texts.en:
Piruz is 43 years old. She lives in Yerevan with her father and three sons. Piruz's one son is a trader, and her two sons are constructors. Piruz trades with clothing in one of the city markets. She rents a booth for the business. This is one of the most busy markets in the city with big number of clients. Due to high quality of services Piruz has attracted big number of clients. 
Now Piruz wants to renew the clothing variety, for which she has applied for this loan. With the loan's help Piruz will purchase clothing and offer larger variety of clothing for her clients. 
Development of trading will allow Piruz to get more income, which is important for her to support her sons and their family's in the future.

loans.use: to pay for clothing

loans.name: Lhagvajav

texts.en: Lhagvajav is a 27 years old woman who lives with her mother and a son in Huvsgul province in Northern Mongolia. Her son goes to the local kindergarden and her mother is a retiree. She has been trained at the hairdressers' course and used to work as an assistant. Now she rents a seat at the salon and has been running the business successfully. She has made number of regular customers in the area. She has been improving the family household significantly. Lhagvajav is a smart woman who says that ""I would like to develop the business activity by buying the necessary tools for the business"". The total amount she is requesting is 1,200,000 MNT to buy the necessary salon tools.

loans.use: To buy the necessary salon tools

loans.name: Batmunh

texts.en: Batmunh is a 48 years old man who lives with his wife and 3 children in Huvsgul province in Northern Mongolia. His oldest child studies at the university and two children go to the secondary school. His wife is unemployed. He started the business in 1994 and he produces iron made utensils and other home staffs. It has been successful because there has been a demand for the local customers. He also bought a small van with the business income and when the sales are low, he runs the taxi business sometimes. It has been the only financial source for the family members. Batmunh is a good-natured man who says that "I would like to develop the business activities by buying the materials in wholesale so that I could save more and produce more at one time". The total amount he is requesting is 1,000,000 MNT to buy necessary materials.

loans.use: To buy necessary materials

loans.name: Enebish

texts.en: Enebish is a 53 years old man who lives with his wife and a daughter in Huvsgul province in Northern Mongolia. His daughter is 28 years old and his wife is employed. He has started beauty supply business in 2010 after he retired. When his daughter graduated as a pharmacist, he started the pharmacy business, too. He brings the supplies and his daughter stays at the shop counter and works as a shop assistant. Enebish is a hardworking and nice man who says that ""I would like to expand the business activity by purchasing the goods in wholesale so that I could save the transportation expenses and spend it on the right needs"". The total amount he is requesting is 2,500,000 MNT to buy the beauty supplies in large quantities.

loans.use: To buy the beauty supplies in large quantities

loans.name: Srey Oun

texts.en:
Srey Oun is aged 32, married and no kid yet. She lives with her husband in a village located in the Kang Meas district of Cambodia. She and her husband earn a living through farming for every three months, pig raising for every four months and supplement their income through fishing and musician for wedding once a month. They have been in this business for eight years. With the current source of income, she can earn up to US$6 per day but can save only around US$1.5 each day. 

This is Srey Oun's second loan with VisionFund, Kiva's field partner. With a lack of money for her house renovation, she is requesting a loan of 1,300,000 Khmer riels. She will use the entire loan to buy wooden timber and zinc for her house renovation. She hopes that this loan will enable her and her family to have a decent, clean house for living in.

loans.use: To buy wooden timber and zinc for her house renovation

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Buraima

texts.en: Bai Tushum and Partners expresses gratitude to all Kiva lenders who helped Buraima obtain her first Kiva loan, which was used as intended and repaid. She was able to broaden her herd. Now Buraima has applied for a loan of KGS 100.000 for purchasing additional cattle. Revenues from this loan will be used for purchasing materials for her house  building.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Hudson

texts.en:
Hudson is 40 years old from Naivasha and is married with three children who are in school.

Hudson has a cereals business that he has been doing for the past six months and has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD, to enable him buy more beans to add to his stock.

He hopes to open a posho mill in the near future.

loans.use: To buy more beans for sale.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 35 years old from Naivasha and is married.

Joseph is a farmer and has been in farming activity for the past 12 years. He has applied for her second loan from KADET LTD, to enable him buy fertilizers, seedlings and pesticides for his farm.

He hopes to see his business expand in the near future.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers,seedlings and pesticides for his farm.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is 35 years old, from Nakuru and is married with three children who are in school.

Julius has a business of extracting stones and sell to her customer, for the past 14 years. He has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD, to enable him buy another piece of land that will help him extract more stones.

He hopes to own a quarry in the near future.

loans.use: To buy a piece of land.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 22-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and only one child. He’s trying his best and working hard in order to be able to satisfy his family needs. After many years of experience in repairing and selling wheels, Ali decided to open his own shop in 2007. Today, he’s requesting to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase extra products for his business such as wheels and renew his tools as well. This kiva loan will boost his business and allow him attract new customers. In the future, he plans to work as wheels trader.

loans.use: to purchase extra products for his business such as wheels and renew his tools as well

loans.name: Abdel Karim

texts.en: Abdel karim is a 46-year-old Lebanese man. He’s widowed, living on his own. He’s doing his best to have a good way of living. It was a bit hard for him to open his own laundry, but not possible. He has a positive point as he knows every single detail concerning this job; so he opened his own laundry in 2010. Today, he’s looking to borrow a loan from kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a dryer machine for his business. He notes that this will enhance his way of working therefore increase his revenues. In the future, he plans to collect added income and improve his life.

loans.use: to purchase a dryer machine for his business

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 48-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife. They have three children who are all attending school. He’s doing his best to earn superior income and be able to live as it should be with the cooperation of his wife. He has owned an accessories and gifts shop since 1994. Today, he’s asking to borrow a loan from kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase added products for his shop such as accessories, gifts and many other items. He notes that this kiva loan will increase his sales and help him attract new customers. In the future, he plans to open other branches in different areas.

loans.use: to purchase added products for his shop such as accessories, gifts and many other items

loans.name: Taha

texts.en: Taha is a 24-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and three siblings who one of them is working. His father who has been serving at the Lebanese army is the one taking care of the family. In order to help him, Taha decided to work independently as a plumber since 2009. He’s brave and works with high professionalism. Today, he wants to borrow a youth loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase added plumbing tools for his new projects. He notes that this will help him carry on his work in a proper way. In the future, he plans to open his own plumbing tools shop.

loans.use: to purchase added plumbing tools for his new projects

loans.name: Salwa

texts.en: Salwa is a 48-year-old Lebanese married woman. She lives with her husband and three children. Two of them are working and the other is still studying. Her husband is the one looking to offer them a good future. As for her, Salwa has been working as a tailor since 1995. She also works as a clothing trader. Today, and in order to earn higher revenues, she has the intention to borrow a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase the needed products for her business such as textiles, clothes and many other items. In the future, she plans to open her own clothing shop.

loans.use: to purchase the needed products for her business such as textiles, clothes and many other items

loans.name: Bilha

texts.en:
Bilha is 29 years old, retail shop owner in Bamburi, mombasa. She is married, and a mother of two school going children. She has been a shopkeeper for the past two years. Her business is doing great.

This marks her first borrowing from KADET LTD,to finance her business. She plans to purchase more sugar, salt, cooking oil and washing detergents. 

She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business further and to repay her loan. She hopes to have a well established business.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar, salt, cooking oil and washing detergents

loans.name: Nabil

texts.en: Nabil is a 46-year-old man. He lives in Lebanon. He’s married and lives with his wife and four children who three of them are working. He strives to work really hard to be able to offer a suitable life for all of them. Nabil started his own work as cars black smith in 1990, and has gained a fair number of customers so far. Today, he needs to borrow a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase added mechanic tools for his business. This will facilitate his business operations and allow him attract added people. In the future, he plans to enlarge his shop and increase his earnings.

loans.use: to purchase added mechanic tools for his business

loans.name: Issam

texts.en: Issam is a 33-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his parents and five siblings who two of them are working. The whole family combine forces in order to live properly and as it should be. As for Issam, he has owned flowers shop since year 2000. He has a variety of flowers at fair prices. Today, he's asking for a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to export the needed quantity of flowers from outside the country. He’s sure that this kiva loan will increase his sales therefore his profits. In the future, he plans to have his own land where he can cultivate flowers.

loans.use: to export the needed quantity of flowers from outside the country

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is a 47-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and six children who are all attending school. He has big responsibilities to care for especially after being the only one responsible for his family. In year 2000, Hussein started his own work as van driver on a free-lance basis. He’s a reputable man, what make his customers loyal to him. Today, he has the intention to borrow a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new van for his business. This new van will allow him transport more people. In the future, he plans to buy another van and hire someone to work with him.

loans.use: to purchase a new van for his business

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is 33 years old fish monger in Mombasa. She is a married mother of three and has been doing this business for the last five years successfully. 

This marks her second business loan from KADET. She plans to use the loan to purchase more tilapia, Nile perch and prawns to sell to her customers. 

The anticipated profits will be used to buy more stock of fish and repay her loan. She hopes to realize more profits from the sales and thus be able to expand her business further.

loans.use: to purchase more tilapia, Nile perch and prawns

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Daniel is a businessman,he does motorcycle transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business for 7 years and has describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya,he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 90,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike

loans.name: Arafat

texts.en: Arafat is a 42-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and four children, some of them are still attending school. He has owned a shop since 2005 where he sells electronics and home appliances. Today, he is asking for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to increase his inventory of new electronics such as mixers, electric fans, casseroles etc… In the future, he plans to add more items into his shop in order to increase his sales and therefore his income.

loans.use: to increase his inventory of new electronics such as mixers, electric fans, casseroles etc…

loans.name: Agwenyi

texts.en:
Agwenyi is 50 years old from Nakuru and is married with three children. He is an estates agent.

Agwenyi has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD, to enable him buy paint,window panes,do renovations of his office and also pay his workers. He is optimistic that he will serve his clients well who come looking for houses when his office looks better.

He hopes to expand his business and buy a piece of land in the near future.

loans.use: To buy pain,window panes.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 26 years old from Njabini and is married with one daughter who is six years old.

Zipporah is a farmer and has been in it for the past 66 years. He has applied for her seventh loan from KADET LTD, to enable him buy fertilizers,seedlings and pesticides for his farm.

He hopes to buy more farm inputs and increase his production and sales in order to improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers,seedlings and pesticides

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 41-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and five children who are still attending school. After losing hopes in finding a proper job, he decided to work on his own as a taxi driver one year ago to be able to afford the heavy life expenses. Today, he is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform the needed maintenance on his car so as to carry on with his transportations safely. In the future, he plans to purchase another car in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to perform the needed maintenance on his car so as to carry on with his transportations safely

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en: Fadi is a 31-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife. He has owned a barber shop in his town many years ago. Due to his loyalty and great customer service, there is good number of customers visiting his shop. Even though, his income is barely sufficient for him to be able to pay the high costs of living. So, today, he is asking for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to improve his shop and purchase an electrical generator for his business. In the future, he plans to borrow another Kiva loan with the intention of renovating his shop to attract more customers.

loans.use: to improve his shop and purchase an electrical generator for his business

loans.name: Kadzo

texts.en:
Kadzo is 40 year old charcoal seller in Mombasa.She is married and a mother of six children. She has been doing this business for the last four years with great success.
 
This is her second business loan from KADET to finance her business. She plans to purchase more sacks of charcoal to resell to her customers.


She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children and expand her business further. She hopes have a successful business and thus live a happier and comfortable life.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Constance

texts.en:
Constance is 37 years old,she practices dairy farming in Mariakani. She is a married mother of four and has been selling milk to her customers for the past four years with great success.

This is her second business loan from KADET. She plans to purchase more dairy cattle. She will use the anticipated profits to build herself a residential house. She hopes to excel in the business.

loans.use: to purchase more dairy cattle

loans.name: Loise

texts.en:
Loise is 22 years old from Naivasha and is married to Peter, they have one daughter who is eight years old and in Primary school.

Loise has a timber yard that she has been running for the past four years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD, to enable her buy more timber to add to her stock.

She hopes to own a full fledged timber and hardware store in Naivasha in the near future.

loans.use: To buy more timber to add to her stock.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie, age 48, is married with 6 children. She has 4 children still attending school. She also cares for 4 other family members who are not able to support themselves.

 She sells pagne, colorful African fabric, in her shop in a local market. Pagne is mainly used to make clothing, but can also be used for table clothes, napkins, and curtains. 

 Rosalie will use the loan to buy more pagne for her shop. She has operated this business since 1982! She is very experienced in buying and selling pagne, and has acquired many loyal customers throughout the years. Her strategy is to buy good quality pagne to stock her shop. 

Rosalie has received 3 previous loans from Kiva's partner, HOPE Congo. She has a very good repayment record. She hopes to one day be able to send her kids to study abroad. She wishes for her children to be successful and happy.

loans.use: to pay for pagne, colorful African fabric, to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Riziki

texts.en:
Riziki is 33 years old, she owns retail shop in Mombasa. She is married ,and a mother of three children. She has been a shopkeeper for the past five years. She also sells water and fresh juices to supplement her income. Her business is doing great.

This marks her first borrowing from KADET to finance her business. She plans to purchase more sugar, salt, cooking oil and washing detergents. 

She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business further and to repay her loan. She hopes to have a well established business.

loans.use: to purchase more sugar, salt, cooking oil and washing detergents

loans.name: Aitbubu

texts.en: Bai Tushum and Partners expresses gratitude to all Kiva lenders who helped Aitbubu obtain her two Kiva loans, which were used as intended and repaid. She was able to broaden her herd. Now Aitbubu  has applied for a loan of KGS 20.000 for purchasing additional cattle. Revenues from this loan will be used for purchasing materials for her house reconstruction.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.es:
Amparo se dedica hace aproximadamente 20 años a las labores del campo gracias a que su padre se dedicaba a estas actividades y se las enseñó cuando era muy joven. Actualmente, Amparo se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos, y con su esposo tienen un cultivo de verduras y una producción de leche. El cultivo lo maneja su esposo que tiene un poco más de conocimientos que ella, y el cuidado de las vacas lecheras y el ordeñarlas corren por cuenta de Amparo. De esta manera contribuye con la generación de ingresos para el sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. Gracias al buen cuidado que da Amparo a su vaca, esta le ha dado leche de muy buena calidad, y por esto su producto es muy apetecido por sus clientes. Con el ánimo de aumentar su producción de leche, Amparo busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una vaca para aumentar su producción de leche y poder responder a la demanda del mercado.

De esta manera sus ingresos mensuales aumentarán considerablemente, pues tendrá la capacidad para abastecer los pedidos de sus clientes. Además, Amparo espera que con mayores ingresos sus 2 hijos y su esposo tengan la oportunidad de acceder a una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.

loans.use: Compra de una vaca para aumentar su producción de leche y poder responder a la demanda del mercado.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 60 years old widow who supports eight people in her family. She sells fruits and vegetables, a  business she started eight years ago. 

She has requested for a loan of KES 10,000 to purchase potatoes,bananas and vegetables for sale. The profit she makes would aid her build a grocery shop. Her dream is to be a successful business woman,this is her first loan.

loans.use: To purchase potatoes,bananas and vegetables for sale.

loans.name: Maria Lucero

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que ha tenido una gran fortaleza para superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida. Maria es una madre soltera cabeza de familia, pues su ex esposo murió hace un tiempo y la dejó viuda a cargo de su único hijo. En ese entonces, Maria tenía un empleo con el cual generaba ingresos para contribuir económicamente en su hogar, pero con la muerte de su esposo se vio en la obligación de dejar su empleo para poder estar más al cuidado de su hijo. Debido a que necesariamente tenía que generar ingresos, montó un taller de confección donde ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros y el cual, gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos, ha tenido un gran reconocimiento en el sector y le ha permitido captar un gran número de clientes. En su taller, Maria se ha caracterizado por entregar pedidos a tiempo, y siempre ofrecer un buen servicio a sus clientes, y esto le ha permitido venir captando cada vez más clientes para su negocio. Gracias a que actualmente sus pedidos se han incrementado considerablemente, Maria busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina fileteadora con la cual pueda generar un empleo en su taller.

De esta manera, Maria podrá ofrecer la herramienta de trabajo para la persona que le colaborará en su taller para aumentar la capacidad de producción y así responder a todos los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes. Además, Maria espera que así su taller siga creciendo y le siga generando cada vez más ingresos, ya que su hijo esta próximo a dejar la secundaria y requiere de dinero para pagar sus gastos universitarios. Maria sueña con tener un gran taller, generar mucho empleo y poder ofrecerle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para seguir progresando.

loans.use: Compra de una máquina fileteadora con la cual pueda generar un empleo en su taller.

loans.name: Victor Alfonso

texts.es:
Emprendedor y carismático son las mejores palabras para describir a Victor, un joven que a pesar de su corta edad ha decidido montar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar sus propios ingresos y contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Su madre es una madre soltera cabeza de familia, y además de esto, Victor tiene 3 hermanos con síndrome de down, por lo que es su único apoyo en su hogar. Debido entonces a que los ingresos que genera su madre en el empleo no son suficientes para poder sostener todos los gastos de su hogar, Victor decidió contribuir de la manera en que fuera posible y así montó su tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar, snack y dulces. Hace aproximadamente 1 año y medio desde que Victor tiene su tienda y esta ha venido creciendo rápidamente, motivada principalmente por la buena atención que ofrece Victor a sus clientes. Con el ánimo de seguir creciendo en su tienda y ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes, Victor busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas en su tienda para hacerla más amplia y comprar un refrigerador para ofrecer productos que requieren de estar refrigerados.

De esta manera Victor aumentará sus ventas puesto que ofrecerá mayores productos y así también hará más atractiva su tienda para los clientes. Además, Victor espera que con mayores ingreos su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para seguir progresando.

loans.use: Realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas en su tienda para hacerla más amplia y comprar un refrigerador para ofrecer productos que requieren de estar refrigerados.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en:
Hannah is 53 years old and single with five children. She is a farmer and has been in the business for the past 23 years.

This is her second loan KADET LTD .She paid her previous loan well and in good time.She will use the loan  to purchase a dairy cow.

She hopes to be among the top farmers in her area.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 57 years old.She is married to Daniel and together they have three children.She is a farmer and has been in the business for the past 10 years.

This is her first loan from KADET LTD.She was introduced to KADET LTD by a client.She will use the loan to purchase fertilizer,seedlings and part of it to pay school fees.

She hopes to manage to see all her children through their education.

loans.use: Purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: Betty  de 50 años  vive en el municipio de Soledad, a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Barranquilla, con su esposo y tiene 2  hijos en las edades de 22 y 25 años.  Ella tiene una tienda  donde vende ranchos, víveres, refrescos y artículos de la canasta familiar. Su actividad la inició hace 5 años,  como un pequeño negocio donde vendía pocos artículos, como tubérculos y leguminosas. A ella le empezó a ir muy bien,  porque iniciaron la construcción de 2 urbanizaciones cercanas,  que se convirtieron en su oportunidad empresarial para crecer. En la actualidad planea aumentar el surtido y comprar en mayor volumen y esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento, que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará abarrotes, tubérculos, refrescos, leguminosas y en general articulo de la canasta familiar, que son los que compra su clientela diariamente, al detalle  para elaborar la comida de su familia. Su meta es fortalecer su buen nombre, ofreciendo un buen servicio, mercancía a precios competitivos y con ello muy seguramente logrará que su negocio sea  cada vez más sostenible.

loans.use: comprará abarrotes, tubérculos, refrescos, leguminosas y en general articulo de la canasta familiar

loans.name: Cosmas

texts.en:
Thirty seven year old Cosmas is married to Esther and blessed with three children aged 10,eight and four years respectively. He sells shoes, a business he has been doing for the past five years and earns a monthly income of KES 8,500. 

He has requested for a loan worth KES 20,000 to purchase more shoes for sale. The profit made from his sales would assist her start a business for her wife. His dream is to become a prominent businessman in future, this is his first loan.

loans.use: To purchase a bale of shoes for sale.

loans.name: Rim-15769-A's Group

texts.fr: Agée de 44 ans, Grace Monilola est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. Elle vit chez son mari ou elle mène ses activités. Elle a sollicité un concours auprès de Finadev pour renforcer ses activités afin d'agrandir son fonds de commerce et surtout supporter la charge scolaire de ses enfants. Elle est en caution avec Anna Mahuton qui commercialise aussi des divers. La responsable et à droite de la photo.
texts.en:
Grace Monilola, aged 44, is a married mother of four children. She lives with her husband, she runs her businesses. She has requested funding from Finadev for bolstering her business in order to expand her working capital and especially to cover her children's schooling costs. 

She has a [deposit] with Anna Mahuton, who also markets a variety of goods. 

The group's official is at the right in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a box of skin lotion, a box of spaghetti, 10 lengths of fabric, and 20 liters of oil

loans.name: Abelardo

texts.es:
Abelardo es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajador y esto le ha permitido superar grandes adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida. Debido a que tenía muy pocas oportunidades laborales en su municipio, decidió irse para la finca de un amigo donde tiene un terreno que no estaba cultivado y este le prestó el terreno y un dinero inicial con el que comenzó un cultivo de frutas. Así, comenzó a poder generar ingresos con los cuales sostenía todos sus gastos y los de su familia. Posteriormente, su cultivo fue creciendo y gracias a esto ha podido tener una mejor calidad de vida y le ha brindado mayores oportunidades de progreso a su familia. Se encuentra muy agradecido con su amigo que lo ayudó a salir adelante y por esto siempre que tiene la oportunidad se lo agradece con algunos ingresos que le genera su cultivo. Gracias a la buena calidad de sus cultivos de frutas, Abelardo ha tenido grandes pedidos por parte de sus clientes, y es por esto que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de abono, riegos e insecticidas para su cultivo.

Abelardo espera que su negocio siga saliendo adelante y su familia pueda tener una mejor calidad de vida. Además, sueña con poder regresar a su municipio y reunirse con el resto de sus hermanos y sus padres.

loans.use: Compra de abono, riegos e insecticidas para su cultivo.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is 45 years old.He is married to Jane and together they have four children. He is a green grocer and has been in the business for the past 12 years.

This is his first term loan.He was introduced to KADET LTD by a client.He will use the loan amount to purchase stock of cabbages,fruits and kales for his business.

He hopes to boost his green grocery to improve his living standards.

loans.use: Purchase  more stock of  cabbages,fruits and kales for his business.

loans.name: Bibiana Andrea

texts.es:
Bibiana es una gran emprendedora que vio en su capacidad para crear artesanías una oportunidad de negocio y así contribuir económicamente en su hogar. Bibiana se encuentra casada y tiene un hijo de 12 años quien es su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. Hace aproximadamente 2 años, Bibiana comenzó fabricando desde su casa algunos artículos en madera y se los ofreció a sus amigos; al ver que sus productos habían tenido una gran acogida por parte de ellos, decidió comenzar a producir en mayor cantidad y ofrecer a más personas para así generar ingresos. Fue así entonces como se pasó para una carpintería de un amigo donde este le brindó un pequeño espacio para elaborar sus productos y así fue poco a poco creciendo hasta tener muy buenas ventas en su negocio. Actualmente, Bibiana tiene un buen negocio donde puede vender lo necesario para contribuir económicamente para los gastos de su hogar y poder brindarle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida. Ahora, Bibiana espera trasladar la producción de su negocio para la terraza de su casa, por lo que busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de herramientas de trabajo para elaborar sus productos.

De esta manera Bibiana tendrá sus propias herramientas de trabajo para fabricar sus productos y podrá estar en la comodidad de su hogar estando al cuidado de su hijo. Además, así seguirá creciendo y podrá en un futuro tener un gran negocio que le brinde la oportunidad de brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso.

loans.use: Compra de herramientas de trabajo para elaborar sus productos.

loans.name: Benadatte

texts.en:
Benardatte is 43 years married to and are blessed with for children aged 24, 18,14 and 12 years respectively. She owns a salon, a business she started 15 years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 8,000. 

She has requested for a loan worth KES.20,000 to purchase hair shampoos, conditioners,weaves and braids, the anticipated profit will help to pay school fees for her children. He dreams of being a prominent business lady. This is his first loan.

loans.use: To purchase  hair shapoos, conditioners,weaves and braids

loans.name: Juan Matias
